header.descriptor: Blade shape: The dagger’s blade is
Blade finish: The dagger’s blade is
Hilt feature: The dagger’s hilt features
Special damage: When properly activated, the dagger can wound foes with

results: Erupts with a burst of flame on a hit.
Erupts with a burst of lightning on a hit.
Stuns the wielder on a critical miss.
Poisons the wielder on a miss.
Returns to the wielder’s hand when thrown.

header.descriptor: Activation: The dagger’s special damage or special property activates or amplifies

results: Against a specific type of enemy (6): 1. dragons; 2. elves; 3. fiends; 4. goblinoids; 5. shapeshifters; 6. undead.
When wielded by a member of a specific race (2): 1. dark elf; 2. dwarf; 3. kobold; 4. orc; 5. shadowfolk; 6. wood elf.

header.descriptor: Creator: The dagger was made by a/an
Past wielder: The dagger’s most infamous wielder was a/an
